NK100(the)008:1: // snyan brgyud gsal byed bzhugs so //
NK100(the)008:2: 'gro mgon sprul sku khyed la gus pas 'dud /
NK100(the)008:3: snyan rgyud gsal byed brjed thoor bri bar bya //
NK100(the)008:4: slob dpon a ro ye shes 'byung gnas kyis khams
NK100(the)008:5: kyi ya zi bon ston la snyan brgyud rin po
NK100(the)008:6: che gdab pa'i gdams ngag bstan pa bzhin du /
NK100(the)008:7: 'o skol 'dir yang 'chad cing ston par bgyid /
NK100(the)008:9: slob bu nges shes bskyed pa brgyud pa'i lo rgyus bstan pa dang /
NK100(the)008:10: nyams su blang pa gdams ngag rin po che gdab pa'o //
NK100(the)008:12: spyir bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi ston pa 'byung /
NK100(the)008:13: de la da res kyi bstan pa'i gtso bo sh+aaka
NK100(the)008:14: thub kyis gsang sngags dngos su bshad pa'i dus la
NK100(the)008:15: ma bab nas / dpal a pa ra g+har tir sku sprul nas /
NK100(the)008:16: lho phyogs dpal gyi ri la bzhugs so //
NK100(the)008:17: dus de'i tshe mnga' bdag me tri ba zhes bya
NK100(the)008:18: bas thos bsam mang po byas pa dang pany+tsa bi
NK100(the)008:19: ta thams cad kyi spyan sngar byon pa dang /
NK100(the)008:20: rnal 'byor nyer gcig gi spyan sngar byon pas kyang rdzogs chen gyi gdams ngag ma rnyed pa la /
NK100(the)008:21: mkhas 'gro ma la tshogs 'khor bskor gyi gsol ba btab pas /
NK100(the)008:23: lho phyogs dang dpal gyi ri zhes pa //
NK100(the)008:24: yid 'pham byed pa'i gnas mchog na //
NK100(the)008:25: g+hir ti a pa ra zhes pas //
NK100(the)008:26: dga' rab rdo rje'i sprul pa'i sku //
NK100(the)008:27: sa ra ha ni chen po bzhugs //
NK100(the)008:28: bu khyod song zhig der song la //
NK100(the)008:29: rang sems sangs rgyas snyug pa'i don //
NK100(the)008:30: ma nor bden pa'i gdams ngag ste //
NK100(the)008:31: zhus la yid la dran par gyis //
NK100(the)008:34: dam pa chos kyi lo rgyus las /
NK100(the)008:35: byang chub kyi sems gtan la phebs pa'i chos ni
NK100(the)008:36: lho phyogs dpal gyi ri la yod do bar 'dug
NK100(the)008:37: nas / de nas me tri bas thang khob shing
NK100(the)008:38: med chu med zla ba gcig dang chu spus nub
NK100(the)008:39: tsam zla ba phyed rgal nas byon pas /
NK100(the)008:46: de la bod kyi lo tsa ba b+aee ro tsa
NK100(the)008:47: na zhes bya ba rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul
NK100(the)008:48: pa / sa brgyad non pa des /
NK100(the)008:49: dka' ba du mas rgya gar du byon nas /
NK100(the)008:50: snga 'gyur lnga la sogs pa zhus pas /
NK100(the)008:51: sgom dka' kha g.yel bar 'dug nas /
NK100(the)008:52: mjug gser gyi pa tra cig phul nas /
NK100(the)008:53: byang chub sems gtan la 'phebs pa'i chos /
NK100(the)008:56: 'gyur ba med pa cig zhu 'tshal zhes zhus pas /
NK100(the)008:57: rigs kyi bu snod dang ldan pa khyod la bshad do gsungs nas /
NK100(the)008:60: snyags gnya' na ku ma ra la bshad /
NK100(the)008:61: des a ro ye shes 'byung gnas sprul pa'i sku de bshad /
NK100(the)008:62: de yang rgya gar bdun brgyud kyi gdams ngag yod pa /
NK100(the)008:63: ha shang bdun brgyud kyi gdams ngag yod pa /
NK100(the)008:64: dam pa'i chos mtha' dag la mkhas pa /
NK100(the)008:65: shin tu bsgom nyams dang ldan pa /
NK100(the)008:66: mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'o //
NK100(the)008:67: de la slob ma mang yang thugs zin pa bzhi las /
NK100(the)008:68: khams kyi ya zi bon ston la skor gsum ka bshad /
NK100(the)008:69: bru sha zer kyang khyung po mdo ston seng ge rgyal mtshan la sprul skor gtso cher bshad /
NK100(the)008:70: dbus kyi drum shing shes rab smon lam la gzer ka gtso cher bshad /
NK100(the)008:71: gtsang gi co ro zangs ka mdzod khur la 'khrul 'khor gtsor cher bshad do //
NK100(the)008:72: de ltar bzhi las las 'di ya zis /
NK100(the)008:73: rgyan g+hong gi gru gu glog 'byung la bshad /
NK100(the)008:74: des ra gzar shar gyi rkong rab mtsho zhes bya
NK100(the)008:75: ba tshong dpon mi skye gcig gi rkong gi 'bul
NK100(the)008:76: nag bya ba phul nas zhus /
NK100(the)008:77: des khro pa ltam dar ma la bshad /
NK100(the)008:78: des 'tshe chung ston pa la bshad de /
NK100(the)008:79: de yang kyi mkhar 'byid phu'i brag la grub pa thob ste /
NK100(the)008:81: nga'i ro 'di bsregs la rtags 'dra byung na dge snyogs kyis /
NK100(the)008:82: ma byung na ci yang bya mi dgos gsung nas spur sbyangs pas /
NK100(the)008:84: rus pa yang bya 'ur du song nas snyim pa gang ba tsam las ma byung skad /
NK100(the)008:85: des lce bsgom dgon pa ba la bshad /
NK100(the)008:86: des spor chung ston pa la bshad /
NK100(the)008:90: skabs su gsang spyod kyi ldom bu bag re mdzad pas /
NK100(the)008:91: dbus pa ldom bu ba chen por yang grags so //
NK100(the)008:92: des dam pa shag rgyal la bshad de /
NK100(the)008:93: de yang nyang smad sgro dar re bya ba rnam
NK100(the)008:94: 'joms dang phur pa mkhas pa cig ston spyid chos
NK100(the)008:95: bar du mi chen mang po 'tshogs pas der mdzom
NK100(the)008:96: nas gleng blangs byas pas mnyes nas /
NK100(the)008:97: sor chung la gdams ngag 'di rnams zhus /
NK100(the)008:98: khong gis lha rje la sgro ba nag po'i skor tshan cig zhu'o //
NK100(the)008:99: des dbon po jo btsun gzung nge gnang /
NK100(the)008:100: des sprul sku rin po che la /
NK100(the)008:101: yang dam pa shag rgyal gyis so brag pa la /
NK100(the)008:102: des sprul sku rin po che las /
NK100(the)008:103: des rta rin chen po la /
NK100(the)008:104: des rta ston gzi rjid la /
NK100(the)008:106: gdams ngag rin po che gdab pa la gnyis te /
NK100(the)008:107: pan ny+tsa bi ta'i bshad lugs go sla /
NK100(the)008:108: ku su lu'i bslab lugs la gnyis las /
NK100(the)008:110: 'jam rlung dang drag rlung gnyis las /
NK100(the)008:111: 'jam rlung ni na so rgan pa dang khams ngan pa la bya /
NK100(the)008:112: drag rlung ni khams bzang pa dang na so gzhon pa la bya'o //
NK100(the)008:113: de las 'jam rlung ni stan bde ba la lus tsog pur sdad /
NK100(the)008:114: lag pa pus mo la khyud /
NK100(the)008:116: steng rlung sum gnyis nang du bzung /
NK100(the)008:117: sum cha phar 'gro tshur 'gro bya ste /
NK100(the)008:118: de yang sna'i phyir sor gnyis las mi 'da' bar stungs stungs bya'o //
NK100(the)008:119: mthun tshan rab gom pa drug bcu /
NK100(the)008:121: tha ma sum cu 'am nyi shu'o //
NK100(the)008:122: de nas rtsol ba glod la mi rtog pa la
NK100(the)008:123: bzhag /rjes la sengs byas la mi rtog pa'i rjes
NK100(the)008:124: la lta'o // spyir rlung skyon can du gzung pa
NK100(the)008:125: bya ba dug dbyung mi byed par rlung skyon 'chos
NK100(the)008:126: la lta'o // kyi byed do // skyon med du
NK100(the)008:127: gzung pa ni dug dbyung byas kyi 'dzin pa yin
NK100(the)008:128: la lta'o // kyi byed do // te / 'jam rlung la dug dbyung mi dgos gsung /
NK100(the)008:133: dang po lus dkyil krung bca' ste /
NK100(the)008:134: lag pa g.yas g.yon pus mo la bkal /
NK100(the)008:137: 'og nam mkha' stong pa rgya gdugs dkar po tog med pa la rang gi tshul du bsam la /
NK100(the)008:139: steng rlung bum pa dang por thub tshad mnan la /
NK100(the)008:140: dmigs pa gdugs de g.yon skor du 'khor bas bsam zhing /
NK100(the)008:141: rlung mi thub pa 'dra na dmigs pa drag tu gtad /
NK100(the)008:142: ma thub na nems byas la sna nas dal bus gtang ngo //
NK100(the)008:143: glod pa dang rjes la lta ba gong dang mthun no //
NK100(the)008:144: de nas yang kha sna nas dug dbyung lan gsum bya'o //
NK100(the)008:145: lag len gyi dus su sngon du drag rlung /
NK100(the)008:148: bod na lag len med pas ma bkod do //
NK100(the)008:149: de ltar rtags ma byung gi bar du thun du bcug la bya'o //
NK100(the)008:150: de ltar nyams su blangs pas rtags drug la /
NK100(the)008:151: lcags sbubs su chu 'dus pa lta bu ni /
NK100(the)008:152: yur ba 'ging por chu 'gro 'phro la lcags sbubs kyis rngubs pas khyil tsher 'ong ba bzhin du /
NK100(the)008:153: rtog pa la 'gro 'phro la mi rtog pas gnas te /
NK100(the)008:154: shes pa rang bzhin gyis bde lhun ne ba 'ong gsung /
NK100(the)008:155: bye phrug la ser bu phog pa lta bu ni /
NK100(the)008:157: dper na byi phrug spu med de ma'i gshog pas bde 'bol le 'ong pa bzhin du /
NK100(the)008:158: lus 'o mas kha phrus btab pa ltar 'jam pa dang sems bde ba 'byung ngo //
NK100(the)008:159: yang ma mo gzan la song pas bye phrug 'khyags pas 'dar ba sprug pa bzhin du /
NK100(the)008:160: sbyangs pa rtsub pa ni 'dar dang sprug pa la sogs pa'o //
NK100(the)008:161: sems rtog med kyi bde ba lhag lhag pa 'byung ngo //
NK100(the)008:163: spyir nyams dum bur skye ba yin te /
NK100(the)008:164: 'ga' zung las thams cad tshang pa mi skye'o //
NK100(the)008:165: de ni de ltar rtags shar nas lam du blang ste /
NK100(the)008:167: gzhi snying po'i don khong du chud par bya /
NK100(the)008:174: yin lugs ni thams cad byang sems kyi rang bzhin yin te go sla /
NK100(the)008:175: snang lugs dang shar lugs gnyis ni /
NK100(the)008:176: snang lugs chos nyid kyi rtsal rol pa rang snang ris med du snang ste /
NK100(the)008:177: de ltar shes nas snang ba lam du glongs pas /
NK100(the)008:178: shing thag mer bsregs pa dang 'dra ste snang ba rang rgyud pas mi 'ching ngo //
NK100(the)008:179: shar lugs ni snang mkhan ga cig gis byas pa ma yin te /
NK100(the)008:180: rig pa'i rtsal shugs su shar bas yul dang yul
NK100(the)008:181: can med de snang ba yul med du shar ba'o
NK100(the)008:182: // de yang snang lugs rang du ngo sprad /
NK100(the)008:183: shar lugs de rang snang yul ngo bo sprod do gsum ngo //
NK100(the)008:184: lam la lugs 'byung 'khor ba'i chos dang /
NK100(the)008:185: lugs bzlog mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis las lugs
NK100(the)008:186: 'byung 'khor ba'i chos rgyal phru gu sprang por 'khyams
NK100(the)008:188: de yang dper na rgyal po'i phru gu chung ngu na cig yod pa las /
NK100(the)008:190: lo rgyus snyod mkhan gyi mi dang bral bas /
NK100(the)008:191: 'bangs rnams kyi nang nas kyang sprang por 'khyams te /
NK100(the)008:192: lag na gsod ber ka thogs /
NK100(the)008:193: zas su pham babs dang sprang yon za /
NK100(the)008:194: rgyab tu klag sro ma can gon no //
NK100(the)008:195: dus nam zhig na rgyal po cig gdung chad /
NK100(the)008:196: blon po rig pa can gcig gis sprang po'i gseb nas rgyal bu de btsal nas /
NK100(the)008:197: rgyal bu de la rin po che sna bdun gyi khrus gsol /
NK100(the)008:199: gser dngul gyi khri la bzhugs /
NK100(the)008:200: dar ber la sogs pa gon /
NK100(the)008:201: mgo nag la dbang bsgyur ba'o //
NK100(the)008:202: de gnyis khyad par shin tu che ste /
NK100(the)008:203: mi de'i dngos gzhi la khyad par med do //
NK100(the)008:205: lugs 'byung 'khor ba'i chos drug gsal lo //
NK100(the)008:206: lugs nas bzlog pa sprang po rgyal po'i phru gur
NK100(the)008:207: ngo shes pa lta bu gdam gyis bzlog pa gnyis
NK100(the)008:208: / 'di la gdab pa ni lta bsgom spyod pa gsum las /
NK100(the)008:209: de la lta bsgom spyod pa'i skyon yon spyir bstan pa dang /
NK100(the)008:210: bye brag tu nyams su blangs pa'i rim pa'o //
NK100(the)008:211: dang po la mthun pa'i dpe gsum /
NK100(the)008:214: mi dgos pa gsum ste go sla /
NK100(the)008:215: bye brag tu nyams su blang pa'i rim pa la /
NK100(the)008:216: rin po che'i gsung sgrog gis sde'u bcu drug gis ston te /
NK100(the)008:221: de la ngo sprod bzhis sprad de /
NK100(the)008:222: snang ba sems su ngo sprad pa /
NK100(the)008:224: kun nas nyon mongs pa 'khor ba'i chos lugs dang sdug bsngal du snang pa /
NK100(the)008:225: bar lam pa'i chos lta bsgom spyod par snang pa /
NK100(the)008:226: rnam par byang pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos sku dang ye shes su snang pa'o //
NK100(the)008:227: de ltar snang ba 'di chos can /
NK100(the)008:228: sems nyid rang snang ba yin zhes dam bca' /
NK100(the)008:229: gtan tshigs ma grub bo zhes /
NK100(the)008:231: don la nges ming la nges na /
NK100(the)008:232: me gcig pu la bod me zer /
NK100(the)008:236: skad rigs mi mthun pa sum brgya drug cu la /
NK100(the)008:237: ming mi gcig pa sum brgya drug cu 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
NK100(the)008:238: don la yang nges pa phyogs gcig tu grub pa med de /
NK100(the)008:239: phan gnod la yang nges pa med do //
NK100(the)008:240: sa lta bu 'di phan pa phyogs gcig tu grub bam /
NK100(the)008:241: gnod pa phyogs gcig tu grub /
NK100(the)008:242: phan pa phyogs gcig tu grub na /
NK100(the)008:243: sa mig tu stor na na la /
NK100(the)008:244: sa 'og tu lem na 'chi ba la sogs pa gnod par 'dug la /
NK100(the)008:245: gnod pa phyogs gcig du grub na /
NK100(the)008:246: sa la nas btub bzar byung /
NK100(the)008:247: sa la khang pa byas zhugs su byung pas phan pa 'dug ste /
NK100(the)008:248: phan gnod la yong nges pa med do //
NK100(the)008:249: des 'byung ba lnga la sogs kun 'adre'o //
NK100(the)008:250: sman dug la yang nges pa med de /
NK100(the)008:251: tsha lta bu 'di la sman du che ste /
NK100(the)008:252: rma bya la dug tu che /
NK100(the)008:253: mi la tsan dug che ste /
NK100(the)008:254: rma bya la sman du che'o //
NK100(the)008:255: de la sogs te phan gnod la yang nges pa med do //
NK100(the)008:256: chos can gcig la snang ba mi 'dra ba du ma 'byung ba'i phyir nges pa med do //
NK100(the)008:257: mi rtag 'gyur ba'i phyir nges med do //
NK100(the)008:258: de ltar nges pa phyogs gcig tu ma grub pa'i phyir nges pa med do //
NK100(the)008:259: dper na rmi lam bzhin no //
NK100(the)008:260: ngo sprod pa'i dus su dpe don du mas ngo
NK100(the)008:261: sprod de dris kyi ngo ma phrad kyi bar du
NK100(the)008:262: sprad do // de nas thag chod pa dang sems stong par ngo sprad de /
NK100(the)008:263: de yang sems nyid la blta ste kha dog du grub bam /
NK100(the)008:269: kha dog dkar po dmar du ma rnyed /
NK100(the)008:270: dbyibs gru bzhi nar mo zlum po grub /
NK100(the)008:271: mtshan pho mo ma ning du ma rnyed /
NK100(the)008:274: 'dug sa med de ngos gzung thams cad dang bral ste stong pa'o //
NK100(the)008:275: de ltar stong par thag chod kyi bar du dris kyi ngo sprad do //
NK100(the)008:276: stong pa gnyis med du ngo sprad pa ni /
NK100(the)008:278: sems stong pa de gnyis gcig tu 'dug gam tha dad du 'dug bltas pas /
NK100(the)008:279: de gnyis gnyis su med de tshig la snga phyi yang don la gnyis su med de /
NK100(the)008:280: dper na chu zla bzhin no //
NK100(the)008:281: de ltar gnyis med thag ma chod kyi bar du ngo sprad do //
NK100(the)008:282: de nas gnyis med rang grol du ngo sprad pa ni /
NK100(the)008:283: gnyis med yul du byas nas blos mi 'dzin na /
NK100(the)008:284: rang grol zin pas ngo sprad mi dgos /
NK100(the)008:285: gnyis med yul du byas nas blos 'dzin na /
NK100(the)008:286: 'dzin byed kyi blo de ka sems /
NK100(the)008:288: stong pa gnyis med du ngo sprad do //
NK100(the)008:289: der ma zad der chos re re la zad par skyal rgyu'i mthar thug re yod de /
NK100(the)008:290: 'gro bar byed pa la grol grol zhes bya ste /
NK100(the)008:291: de ltar yul du ma grol gyi bar du ngo sprod do //
NK100(the)008:292: de nas ngo sprod pas thag chad chod bzhi nang nas skyes te /
NK100(the)008:293: snang ba sems su ngo sprad pas /
NK100(the)008:294: snang ba sems thag chad the tshom med pa'o //
NK100(the)008:295: sems stong pa stong pa gnyis med /
NK100(the)008:296: gnyis med rang grol du ngo sprad pas gnyis med rang grol du thag chod the tshom med pa'o //
NK100(the)008:297: de ltar rtogs pas gol sa bzhi shugs las chod de /
NK100(the)008:298: de la snang ba sems su shes shing thogs pas phyi'i gol sa chod de /
NK100(the)008:299: de la gol sa dang chod lugs gnyis las /
NK100(the)008:301: so so skye bo yul rang ka ma drug la rang rgyud rigs rgyud du 'dod pa dang /
NK100(the)008:302: mu stegs rtag pa ther zug tu 'dod pa dang /
NK100(the)008:303: nyan thos phyir rngul phran du gyur par 'dod pa'o //
NK100(the)008:304: ngag don dril na phyi rol snang ba rang rgyud du 'dzin pa thams cad do //
NK100(the)008:306: de dag phyir rol logs nas grub pa med de sems nyid rang snang du rtogs pas chod do //
NK100(the)008:307: sems stong par shes shing rtogs pas nang gi gol sa chod pa ni /
NK100(the)008:309: nyan rang 'dzin sems skad gcig ma 'dod par dang /
NK100(the)008:310: sems tsam rang rig rang gsal du 'dod pa dang /
NK100(the)008:311: ngag 'don dril bas sems la dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad do //
NK100(the)008:313: sems nyid ngos bzung dang bral ba'i stong par rtogs pas chod do //
NK100(the)008:314: stong pa gnyis med du shes shing rtogs pas gsang ba'i gol sa chod de /
NK100(the)008:316: byang sems don dam kun rdzob gnyis su 'dod pa dang /
NK100(the)008:317: phyi pa bdag dam tshig sems dpa' dang /
NK100(the)008:318: lha ye shes sems dpa' gnyis su 'dod pa dang /
NK100(the)008:319: ngag don dril na sems la gnyis su 'dzin pa thams cad do //
NK100(the)008:321: stong pa de snang stong gnyis med du shes pas chod do //
NK100(the)008:322: gnyis med rang grol du shes pas mthar thug gi gol sa chod de /
NK100(the)008:324: ma h+aa bden pa dbyer med spyod yul dang bral ba mthar thug tu 'dod pa dang /
NK100(the)008:325: a nu dbyings ye shes dbyer med spyod yul dang bral ba mthar thug tu 'dod pa'o //
NK100(the)008:326: ngag don dril na mthar thug re yul du byas nas 'dzin pa'o //
NK100(the)008:328: gnyis med rang grol du rtogs pas chod do //
NK100(the)008:329: de ltar chod pas zhen pa bzhi ngag gis zlogs /
NK100(the)008:330: snang ba sems su shes shing rtogs pas phyi yul gyi zhen pa mi skye ste /
NK100(the)008:331: zhes pa'i snang ba 'di sems su shes pas chod do //
NK100(the)008:332: sems stong par shes shing rtogs pas /
NK100(the)008:333: nang sems la zhes pa mi skye ste /
NK100(the)008:334: zhen pa'i sems nyid ngos ma zin dang bral bar rtogs pas chod /
NK100(the)008:335: stong pa gnyis med du shes shing rtogs pas gnyis snang la zhen pa mi skye ste /
NK100(the)008:336: mthar zhen pa'i gnyis snang gnyis med du rtogs pas chod do //
NK100(the)008:337: gnyis med rang grol du shes shing rtogs pas mthar
NK100(the)008:338: thug sangs rgyas la re zhing zhen pa mi skye
NK100(the)008:339: ste / mthar thug rang grol du rtogs pas so //
NK100(the)008:340: rdzogs chen gyi bshad pa ci tsam byas kyang don ngo sprod bzhi po der 'dus so //
NK100(the)008:342: bla ma chen po yi ge ji lta ba bzhin gsung ngo //
NK100(the)008:343: man ngag bzhis bsgom pa ngo sprad pa'i skabs su /
NK100(the)008:344: nyid gsum gcig tu bsre ba'i man ngag ni /
NK100(the)008:347: nyi ma dang ser bu med sar kha bltas /
NK100(the)008:348: mig mdun gyi nam mkha' la bltas te kha dog
NK100(the)008:349: dang dbyibs la sogs pa rtag /brtag pas rang bzhin
NK100(the)008:350: med pa'i rtog med cig skye'o //
NK100(the)008:351: dper nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //
NK100(the)008:352: der kha dog nang du log ste nam mkha' rtog mkhan gyi sems nyid la bltas pas /
NK100(the)008:353: kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa gang yang ma
NK100(the)008:354: grub ste ngos gzung dang bral ba'i rtog med cig
NK100(the)008:355: skye don sems kyi sems nyid do //
NK100(the)008:356: der sems stong pa de nam mkha' stong pa de
NK100(the)008:357: la rig pa gtad pas nam mkha' rig med stong
NK100(the)008:358: pa dang / sems nyid rig bcas stong pa gnyis gcig tu 'dres te /
NK100(the)008:359: stong gsal rtog med du gnas pa de chos kyi chos nyid do //
NK100(the)008:360: de yang dang pos sems gzhi deng lta ba ngo sprad la /
NK100(the)008:361: de nas nyi ma gsum ngo sprad de /
NK100(the)008:362: nyi ma gcig nam mkha'i mtshan nyid rtog tu gzhug /gnyis pas sems kyi /
NK100(the)008:363: gsum pa chos nyid la bsgom du gzhug go //
NK100(the)008:364: de ltar gzhag pas chags su ma btub ste rtog pa 'phro na /
NK100(the)008:365: sems tshol ba rjes med pa ni /
NK100(the)008:366: sems mi gzung par gtang ste /
NK100(the)008:367: de yang tha mal pa ltar mi btang ste /
NK100(the)008:368: rig pa'i rjes su rig pa bcug nas dang po yul la 'gro /
NK100(the)008:369: de nas log nas lus la yod pa snyam byed /
NK100(the)008:370: lus la gnas dang kha dog dbyibs la sogs pa ma rnyed pa'o //
NK100(the)008:371: de yang lag len gyi dus su rnam rtog thol skyes pa dang /
NK100(the)008:372: gcer lta ba dus mnyam pa byas pas /
NK100(the)008:373: rang bzhin med par rang sar grol rin po che gsung /
NK100(the)008:374: ru chen po tshig 'di rnams ngo sprod de /
NK100(the)008:375: sems kyi nyid btsal thabs ni /
NK100(the)008:376: khyi rkun dpe bzhin bstan pa ste //
NK100(the)008:377: sems kyi gting nyid legs par bkrug /bkrugs par gting de yod ma rnyed //
NK100(the)008:378: rnyed pa nyid du ma gyur kyang /
NK100(the)008:379: shes pa ma 'gags mi rtog ste //
NK100(the)008:380: btsal bas 'di zhes ma rnyed pas //
NK100(the)008:381: drug pa'i man ngag yin par bshad //
NK100(the)008:383: yid 'phra ma mkhan skyal la gdon pa ni /
NK100(the)008:385: sgo lnga yang rtog med la /
NK100(the)008:386: yid kyis bar kha bskyal te /
NK100(the)008:387: yid de mig gi rjes su zhugs nas gzugs sdug pa la 'dod chags /
NK100(the)008:388: mi sdug pa la zhe sdang /
NK100(the)008:389: gnyis med du ma shes pas gti mug /de'i bag chags kun gzhi la gzhag go //
NK100(the)008:391: kun gzhi mdzod dang 'dra ste bag chags sog /sgo
NK100(the)008:392: lnga sgo dang 'dra te yid 'jug /yid bdag po
NK100(the)008:393: dang 'dra ste sgo nas zhugs nas yul la spyod
NK100(the)008:394: do // skyar la gdon pa ni /
NK100(the)008:395: dper na seng ge dang glang po che gdubs byas
NK100(the)008:396: nas wa skya skyar la bton pa lta bu ste
NK100(the)008:397: / shar ri seng ge gcig yod nub ri la glang po che gcig yod pa la /
NK100(the)008:398: wa skya gcig mno bsam la seng ge dang glang po che 'di gnyis gzugs che la stobs che /
NK100(the)008:399: 'di gnyis 'thabs na gcig la gcig gnyis ka gsod de sha bza' tshang 'ong snyam nas /
NK100(the)008:400: glang po che'i drung du phyin nas seng ge pha
NK100(the)008:401: gi khyod la 'ong par 'dug /kha sdeb ral pa
NK100(the)008:402: bsigs pa 'di khyod la 'ong pa'i rtags yin byas
NK100(the)008:403: / seng ge'i drung phyin nas glang po che khyod la 'ong par 'dug /sa 'thor /
NK100(the)008:405: 'bud 'debs pa 'di khyod la 'ong ba'i rtags yin byas pas /
NK100(the)008:406: gnyis po gcig ltas pas de ltar byed kyi 'dug nas /
NK100(the)008:407: lung pa'i mdor 'tshogs nas seng ge na re khyod nga la ci la 'ong zer /
NK100(the)008:408: glang po che ni rang khyod la mi 'ong /
NK100(the)008:409: wa na re khyod nga la 'ong par 'dug zer ba /
NK100(the)008:410: seng ge na re nga 'ang khyod la mi 'ong /
NK100(the)008:411: 'o na wa na re khyod gnya' ral gsig kha ldeb pa de rang 'ong zer byas pas /
NK100(the)008:412: de nga rang gi spyod pa yin khyod la 'ong pa zer /
NK100(the)008:413: glang po na re yang de skad zer nas /
NK100(the)008:414: glang po che dang seng ge gdums byas pas /
NK100(the)008:415: wa skya de shar ri la phyin na seng ge 'ong /
NK100(the)008:416: nub ri la phyin na glang po che 'ong pas /
NK100(the)008:417: 'phra ma mkhan gyi wa skyar la don no //
NK100(the)008:418: de bzhin du wa skya dang 'dra ba'i 'phra ma mkhan gyi yid de /
NK100(the)008:419: yul 'gyus pa'i dus su nam mkha' la gtad nas
NK100(the)008:420: gzhag par rang bzhin med pa'i rtog med du gnas
NK100(the)008:421: pa de ka la gsal stong rdo rje'i yid ces
NK100(the)008:423: man ngag bzhis bsgom pa ngo sprod zer bas /
NK100(the)008:424: nyid gsum chos nyid bsgom pa /
NK100(the)008:427: cog gzhag gnas lugs bsgom pa'i sgom chen yin rad na gsum ngo //
NK100(the)008:428: ru chen po tshol ba rjes med sems nyid /
NK100(the)008:431: thabs drug gis gzhung bsrang ba la /
NK100(the)008:432: ru chen po rtsal ba khungs su 'dren /
NK100(the)008:434: snyan rgyud ltar bshad gsung ngo //
NK100(the)008:435: de nas gzhag thabs khyung nam mkha' la lding pa lta bu ni mnyam gzhag ltar ro //
NK100(the)008:436: de la sems kyi skye lugs ni gsum du skye ba las /
NK100(the)008:437: bying rgod byung na nam mkha'i sprin ltar ro //
NK100(the)008:438: rjes thob la rmu rgod ltar ro //
NK100(the)008:439: de nyams su len cing lam du slongs na des
NK100(the)008:440: chog ste de ka la drod gsum la sogs pa
NK100(the)008:441: 'char ro // ru rad na snyan rgyud ji bzhin du gsung /
NK100(the)008:442: lnga pa bsgom snang ba bcu tham pas bsgom mkhan ngos gzung pa ni /
NK100(the)008:444: zhi gnas bsgom pa'i sgom chen ngos gzung /
NK100(the)008:448: shes bzhin bdud bzhi gzhom pa ni /
NK100(the)008:449: dang po bdud bzhi ngos bzung ste /
NK100(the)008:451: nyon mongs dug lnga rang rgyud du skyes te khams gsum 'khor bar bdud do //
NK100(the)008:452: phung po'i bdud ni bsgres rgud la sogs pas sdug bsngal lo //
NK100(the)008:454: dngos su ga ra dbang phyug yin la /
NK100(the)008:455: nyams rtags la sogs pa'i dga' brod yin no //
NK100(the)008:457: dngos su 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal lo //
NK100(the)008:458: de la nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni lam du shes pas gzhom ste /
NK100(the)008:459: nyon mongs dug lnga snang stong gnyis med kyi chos nyid du shes pa'o //
NK100(the)008:460: phung pa'i bdud sgyu ma'i shes pas gzhom pa ni /
NK100(the)008:461: snang la mi bden par shes pas so //
NK100(the)008:462: lha'i bu'i bdud grogs su shes pas gzhom pa ni /
NK100(the)008:463: gang byung rang bzhin med pa shes pas so //
NK100(the)008:464: 'chi bdag gi bdud mi rtog par shes pas gzhom pa ni /
NK100(the)008:465: 'chi ba nyid rtog med chos skur shes pas so //
NK100(the)008:466: dgu pa sa bzhis gol sa bcad pa la gsum ste /
NK100(the)008:468: gol sa bcad par yang gsung ste /
NK100(the)008:469: de yang bying rgod gnyis kyi dbang tu song na so so skye bo'i gol sar song pa la /
NK100(the)008:470: bying rgod bcos pas skye bo'i gol sa chod do //
NK100(the)008:473: snang ba sems su gnas pa'i sa /
NK100(the)008:474: sems stong par gnas pa'i sa /
NK100(the)008:475: stong pa gnyis med du gnas pa'i sa /
NK100(the)008:476: gnyis med rang grol du gnas pa'i sa'o //
NK100(the)008:478: bying rgod gnyis med du gnas pa'i sa /
NK100(the)008:479: rig pa yul med du gnas pa'i sa /
NK100(the)008:480: chos nyid yin thog tu gnas pa'i sa'o //
NK100(the)008:481: dang po bying rgod gnyis med mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas /
NK100(the)008:482: so so skye bo bying rgod gnyis la gnas pa'i gol sa chod do //
NK100(the)008:483: gnyis pa gnyis med blo yang rang grol du shes pas /
NK100(the)008:484: chad med pa phyogs gcig pa'i gol sa chod /
NK100(the)008:485: gsum pa rig pa yul med du gnas /
NK100(the)008:487: bsam gtan mu bzhi'i blo yul du bsgom pa'i gol sa chod do //
NK100(the)008:488: bzhi pa chos nyid yin thog tu snang ba la 'dra legs med par tson gyis bzhag pas /
NK100(the)008:489: theg pa chen po bsam gtan gyi gol sa chod do //
NK100(the)008:491: 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /
NK100(the)008:493: gtong ba gsum gdams ngag gi sngon 'gro /
NK100(the)008:494: 'chi ltas shar dbugs thums kyis ma chad par nyams su blang pa ltar rjes su /
NK100(the)008:495: dbugs chad nas nyams su len pa shes rab /
NK100(the)008:496: bar dor nyams su len par bar do'i /
NK100(the)008:497: de yang tshe 'di dang 'chi kha bar do gsum /
NK100(the)008:498: gdams ngag gdab pa'i zhing sa yin gsung ngo //
NK100(the)008:499: de la 'chi ba rjes su dran pa ni /
NK100(the)008:500: tshe zad pa'i dus su 'byung pa rang sar thim ste /
NK100(the)008:501: de yang dam nyams na 'chi ltas brtag long med
NK100(the)008:502: par me gri chu gri rbab gri mtshon gri la
NK100(the)008:503: sogs pa gshis ngan du 'chi bas dam ma nyams
NK100(the)008:504: pa gal che'o // rtags ni sa chu la thim ste /
NK100(the)008:507: lus lci sgyur ldog gzhan gyis byed dgos /
NK100(the)008:508: gos rkyang re las med kyang ris non pa snyom byed /
NK100(the)008:509: 'chi rtags dang po yin te de kas 'chi ba'i dngos gzhi yang med /
NK100(the)008:510: spyir 'byung pa shas che chung gi rigs kyis /
NK100(the)008:511: la la langs dang 'gro 'phro la 'chi ba yang 'dug ste /
NK100(the)008:512: de la yang lus lci zhing 'thibs pa cig 'ong pa yin gsung ngo //
NK100(the)008:513: gnyis pa chu me la thim pas /
NK100(the)008:515: nang gi chu skams pas skan dang lce skam skom snyeg /rna ba 'ur deng 'gro /
NK100(the)008:516: sgra tsar zil pa phrom gyis 'gro /
NK100(the)008:521: me rlung la thim pa ni /
NK100(the)008:522: sdig can la drod yan lag nas yas brdul te
NK100(the)008:523: spyi bor yal na bzang ste mthar thug gi 'bras
NK100(the)008:524: bu thob bo // yas mas gnyis ka nas btul
NK100(the)008:525: nas snying kha'am kag so nas phar yal nas shi
NK100(the)008:526: na lha mi sdod rims kyis 'bras bu thob bo
NK100(the)008:527: bu thob bo // // drod kyi sgo nas gar skyes brtag pa'o //
NK100(the)008:528: spyir drod lag thil tsam gcig 'ong ste /
NK100(the)008:529: de sked pa yan chad du byung na bzang /
NK100(the)008:530: man chad du byung na ngan no //
NK100(the)008:531: rlung rnam par shes pa la thim ste /
NK100(the)008:532: khyi nyi mas tshig pa ltar dbugs tseg gcig 'ong ste /
NK100(the)008:533: de yang ma nus nas ngar 'phro la shugs rings 'ong /
NK100(the)008:534: dus der gnas gcod kyi sdug bsngal 'byung ngo //
NK100(the)008:535: der dbugs chad 'dod pas phar 'gro ba rtsol ba /
NK100(the)008:537: ha zer nas tshur bsdud ma shes par shi na bzang /
NK100(the)008:538: tshur 'dus nas nang nas phyir 'don ma shes na ngan te /
NK100(the)008:539: dbugs kyi ngos nas gar skye brtag pa'o //
NK100(the)008:540: yang lugs gcig du snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo'i
NK100(the)008:541: nang nas rtsa'i dwangs ma dar dkar gyi skud pa
NK100(the)008:542: tsam cig yod pa de sa'i rlung /
NK100(the)008:543: de chu'i rlung la thim ste lus lci ba la sogs pa'o //
NK100(the)008:544: rtsa de'i nang na khrag gi dngas ma mtshal cog
NK100(the)008:545: la bcag pa'i khu ba lta bu yod de chu'i
NK100(the)008:546: rlung / de me'i rlung la thim pas kha sna skams pa la sogs pa'o //
NK100(the)008:547: khrag de ba'i nang na drod kyi dwangs ma me
NK100(the)008:548: long nyi ma la bzhag pa'i ngad tsam zhig yod
NK100(the)008:550: de rlung gi rlung la thim pas drod 'char ro //
NK100(the)008:551: drod de'i nang nas dbugs kyi dwangs ma gser sa
NK100(the)008:552: 'og na gnas pa'i rlangs tsam yod de rlung gi
NK100(the)008:553: rlung ngo // de rnam shes la thim pas dbugs 'chad do //
NK100(the)008:554: de 'byung ba lngar byed na nam mkha' dwangs ma yin no //
NK100(the)008:555: de rtogs ye shes lnga ma rtogs dug lnga'i ldogs pa yang shes so //
NK100(the)008:556: skyo ba rjes su dran pa ni /
NK100(the)008:557: yul dang khang khyim gyis skyo /
NK100(the)008:559: rdzas dang yo byad kyis skyo /
NK100(the)008:562: 'gron po gnas mthun pa dang 'dra ba shes /
NK100(the)008:563: nangs na nye ba'i rang gi lus kyis kyang skyo ste /
NK100(the)008:565: mi gtsang ba sdug bsngal du ma bskyed par byed
NK100(the)008:566: pa gos rnying hrul po dang 'dra bar shes pas
NK100(the)008:567: gtong pa shugs las 'byung bas 'khor bar mi ltung
NK100(the)008:568: ngo // skye bo bas de ltar ma shes te shin tu chags pas 'khor bar ltung ngo //
NK100(the)008:570: de ltar shes pas de rnams la ma chags pa phyad kyis gtong ba'o //
NK100(the)008:572: blo chung na yid dam gyi lha dran par bya ste mi chags par bya /
NK100(the)008:573: dam par lha ni rang sems stong gsal du gnas pa dran par byas la bsgom /
NK100(the)008:575: de'i dus su gzhan tshos kyang bsgom bya'o //
NK100(the)008:576: 'chi ba'i rten gyi gang zag de yang bsgom du
NK100(the)008:577: 'gro ste dpes mtshon pa bya ba yin gsung ngo
NK100(the)008:578: // bar do dran pa ni lag len 'og tu ston /
NK100(the)008:579: shes rab pha rol dran pa ni /
NK100(the)008:580: dbugs thums kyis chad pa'i dus der stong gsal gnyis
NK100(the)008:581: med kyi chos sku rtog med cig yun thung na
NK100(the)008:582: skyes pa mda' gsor ba 'am bud med 'phang gsor
NK100(the)008:584: ring na zhag phyed dang bzhi 'byung gsung /
NK100(the)008:585: de goms 'dris kyi stobs kyis ngo shes par byas la /
NK100(the)008:587: bar dor shar ba de min te chos nyid ma bu 'dres nas sangs rgya'o //
NK100(the)008:588: der ma bu ma 'dres nas bar dor dran par bya ste /
NK100(the)008:589: rtog med de la yid 'gyu byed langs nas bar do'i snang tshul 'char te /
NK100(the)008:590: shi bar ngo ma shes par sngon gyis lus su yod pa snyam byed /
NK100(the)008:591: dbang po sgo lnga rang bzhin gyis tshal /
NK100(the)008:592: sa rdo ri brag la thogs pa med par 'gro /
NK100(the)008:593: de'i dus su shi bar shes byed kyi dbang po 'byung ste /
NK100(the)008:594: nye ba tshos rus pa dang /
NK100(the)008:595: ro bsregs nas du ba rim gyis byung ba la sogs pas shi bar ngo shes te /
NK100(the)008:596: der shes pa zhe sdang ba dang /
NK100(the)008:598: blo zangs bu bu chus khyer ba lta bu 'byung /
NK100(the)008:599: de'i dus su kha gsum sprad de /
NK100(the)008:602: gnyis med goms kha rad na gsung /
NK100(the)008:607: dam pa skye ba snga ma la mi rtog pa rgyud la goms pa dang gcig /
NK100(the)008:608: 'chi ka'i dus su mi rtag pa rgyud la skyes dang gnyis /
NK100(the)008:609: bar do'i dus su mi rtog pa dran pa dang gsum sangs rgyas gsung /
NK100(the)008:610: ngag don dril bas ye nas stong gsal du gnas pa dang /
NK100(the)008:611: snga ma 'am 'chi kar goms par byas pa dang /
NK100(the)008:612: bar dor de'i don dran pa gsum 'dzom nas sangs rgya bas dran dgos so //
NK100(the)008:613: de nas 'di bas rmi lam bsgyur sla /
NK100(the)008:614: rmi lam pas bar do bsgyur sla /
NK100(the)008:615: bar do dran pas gsang sngags kyi gseb lam zhes bya ste /
NK100(the)008:616: rig pa rang sa zin nas 'bras bu thob bo //
NK100(the)008:617: de yang ngag don dril nas /
NK100(the)008:618: dang po 'chi ba dran pas 'chi ltas ngo shes par bya /
NK100(the)008:619: skyo ba dang gtong pas gang la yang ma chags par bya /
NK100(the)008:620: lha stong gsal gnyis na chos sku ngo sprad la 'brel med du nyams su blang ngo //
NK100(the)008:621: dbugs chad pa dang mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi ngo shes par bya /
NK100(the)008:622: der ngo ma shes na bar do kha gsum sprad do //
NK100(the)008:633: bla ma la gsol ba gdab /
NK100(the)008:636: thun mong dang khyad par gyi skyabs 'gro sems bskyed sngon du gtang ngo //
NK100(the)008:640: sems gzung ba rlung gnyis gang 'phrod la sems btul la /
NK100(the)008:641: glod pa dang rjes la blta ba thun sum rtseg tu bya /
NK100(the)008:642: che chung ni dbugs khug pa bac+wa brgyad dam /
NK100(the)008:647: 'khams rab la nyin mtshan gnyis kyi gung bor la /
NK100(the)008:648: snga thun gsum phyi thun gsum drug bya'o //
NK100(the)008:651: khams log na bsgom pa bshol la khams bcos so //
NK100(the)008:652: thun bar du bsgom pa'i ngang ma shor tsam du
NK100(the)008:653: byas la de nas rtags pa byung ba dang lam
NK100(the)008:654: du blang ngo // de la gsum las gzhi snying po'i don tshig gzung /
NK100(the)008:655: don gyi ngo sprod la nges shes ma skyes kyi bar nyi ma gsum du ngo sprad /
NK100(the)008:656: lam rtogs pa'i don 'khrul lugs go bar ngo sprod /
NK100(the)008:657: lugs bzlog lta bsgom gsum las /
NK100(the)008:658: lta ba sde'u bcu drug gis thag ma chod bar du ngo sprod do //
NK100(the)008:659: de'i bar du yang sngar bas rtsol ba glod thun bzhi ma yengs par bya'o //
NK100(the)008:660: de nas nyid gsum gcig tu bsre ba'i man ngag ni /
NK100(the)008:662: rtags gsum la nyi ma re re ngo sprad do //
NK100(the)008:663: de nas khyung nam mkha' la lding pa ltar shes
NK100(the)008:664: pa thang bcad la gzhag /de la skyon byung na
NK100(the)008:665: nam mkha'i sprin lta bu bcos /
NK100(the)008:666: blo chung na spyod lam dang man ngag gis bcos /
NK100(the)008:667: rjes thob rta rmu rgod ltar batsa'o //
NK100(the)008:668: yang yid 'phra ma mkhan skyar 'don ngo sprad /
NK100(the)008:669: de nas bya ba btang ba'i skyes bu bzhin rtsol med du gzhag skyon gong bzhin bcos /
NK100(the)008:670: rjes thob rin po che'i gter ltar bsgom pa'i dmigs pa ma brjed par batsa'o //
NK100(the)008:671: yang byang chub sems cog ma'i man ngag ngo sprad /
NK100(the)008:672: thi bya tshang du 'jug pa bzhin tshon gyis gzhag /skyon gang bzhin bcos /
NK100(the)008:673: rje rgyal po'i btsun mo ltar btsa' ste lta ba'i rtsis gzung /
NK100(the)008:674: thun tshad ni rnam rtog gya gyu mang la khams bzang na /
NK100(the)008:675: thun chung la grangs mang par bya /
NK100(the)008:676: khams bzang la rtog pa nyung na sems 'dzin pas thun ldab kyis ring bar bya /
NK100(the)008:677: khams ngan na grangs kyang ma nyung /
NK100(the)008:679: rjes shes btsa' thabs grims pa gal che'o //
NK100(the)008:682: gol sa sa bzhi sa bcad /
NK100(the)008:683: bsre thabs gsum gyis spyod lam gdab /
NK100(the)008:686: spyod pa lta bsgom las ma yengs par bya /
NK100(the)008:687: tshe 'di la brtson 'grus chung nas mngon du ma gyur na /
NK100(the)008:688: rjes dran drug gis gsal gdab bo //
NK100(the)008:691: gdab pa khrid lugs gsal byed ces bya ba /
NK100(the)008:692: +thii ////rta rin chen dpal gyi phyag dpe lags so //
